title: Paddy The Baddy Talks Fighting 10 Marines At The Same Time
description:
On today's ZBT we've got 3 Rounds In The Magazine ... Round 1: Protesting is as American as it gets. But, I guess there really is a limit. Protesting by using a veteran suicide hotline is a touch far. Round 2: Paddy the Baddie joins the show to talk about fighting with 10 Marines and turning the switch from laughable nice guy to an absolute problem. Round 3: Major protests are breaking out across Iran after morality police killed a woman over her hijab - hear why one major journalist turned down a major interview with their President


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/ZeroBlog30
